messages.subject: homeschool Summer bowling league
messages.msgSnippet: Homeschool Bowling Summer League Make new friends and spend time with old friends. Receive an embroidered bowling shirt at the end of our 14 week season along
messages.messageBody:
Homeschool Bowling Summer League
Make new friends and spend time with old friends.

Receive an embroidered bowling shirt at the end of our
14 week season along with a pizza party.

Two days to choose from: Tuesdays (begains May21st at
1pm) Or
Fridays( May 24th at 1pm)
We will bowl 3 games for the very low price of $5.00
per week
(first week fee will vary slightly)
Bumper Bowlers (ages 9 & under) will bowl 2 games for
$4.00 weekly.

This league is open to all homeschoolers and their
families.
Please contact Theresa Breakfield @Brunswick, 268-4136
Or
email lizzybit@...

This will be at Brunswick Wade Hampton Bowl on Wade
Hampton Blvd in Taylors ,SC
If you are not in the Taylors, SC area contact the
Brunswick Bowling center in your area and ask about a
Homeschooling League. If they dont have one ask about
getting one started.

Happy Bowling!!

__________________________________________________
